thread.title: Mr P Adams
thread.title_full: Pimlico Plumbers reviewed by Mr P Adams

author: Mr P Adams
title: Mr P Adams
text:
David (electrician) came at short notice on 1/2/17 to do an electrical safety certificate in SW4 the day after we moved into a new house we had bought. This was after another plumbing company had let us down at the last minute.
The certificate highlighted a series of serious faults which David was able to rectify on the day, some of which were real safety hazards. David worked quickly and carefully, and we have David back for a full day this week to complete the rest of the necessary works.
Very happy with the service and quality of work completed.
